title: The Travelling tune: a musical phantasy in paper
brief_description: A round the world journey in which we see American jazz trumpeters, Venetian goldoliers, Mexican cowboys, Amerstdam canal-side houses, New York skyscrpaers and Bavarian beer mugs. All these scenes are created from colorful paper cutouts.
